name: AMONG THE ZOMBİES (itch)
description:
A soldier leaves the campsite to go to the military base with gasoline, and dangerous zombies will meet him on the way, and the soldier must cross this dangerous road and reach the military base.

SOLDIER MUST REACH THE MILITARY BASE WITHOUT FEED FOR ZOMBIES

NOTE : THIS IS MY SECOND GAME THE GAME IS A SINGLE PLAYER TENSION HORROR STORY GAME JUMPSPACEDOOR OPENİNGERUNSHİFT
